text: hi! how are you today?
Hello! I am good.  How are you today?
I am doing well thank you. Have you heard of save the children?
I haven't.  What is it all about?
It is an organization that helps raise money to help the children around the world
I have a passion for children.  That would be a charity I would donate too for sure.
It is great. the children are our future and need the chance to have a full life
I do agree 100%  How would I go about finding this charity?
they have a website at  URL
Thank you very much. I will look into it for sure and make a donation.
You can also donate after we finish here, too!
That is awesome. I will definitely be making the donation.
that's great! Do you ever volunteer?
I do volunteer some.  I also take in children that would other wise go without.
that is amazing! you are an excellent human being
Thank you.  Do  you volunteer any where?
I work with chidlren of abuse. it's hard work, but they need help
You are a wonderful person.  Those children need your help.
Well it was lovely chatting! how much will you donate today?
I will donate half of my earnings.  It was lovely chatting with you.  Will you be donating?
